1.name: bulbasaur
1.description: Uma estranha semente foi plantada nas suas costas no momento do nascimento. A planta brota e cresce com este Pokémon.

2.name: ivysaur
2.description: Quando o botão nas suas costas cresce, ele parece perder a habilidade de ficar em pé sobre suas patas traseiras.

3.name: venusaur
3.description: A planta floresce quando está absorvendo energia solar. Ela se move em busca de luz solar.

4.name: charmander
4.description: Obviamente prefere lugares quentes. Quando chove, dizem que vapor sai da ponta da sua cauda.

5.name: charmeleon
5.description: Quando balança sua cauda em chamas, ele eleva a temperatura a níveis insuportavelmente altos.

6.name: charizard
6.description: Solta fogo quente o suficiente para derreter pedras. Conhecido por causar incêndios florestais involuntariamente.

7.name: squirtle
7.description: Após o nascimento, suas costas incham e se transformam em uma casca. Ele spray espuma poderosamente pela boca.

8.name: wartortle
8.description: Costuma se esconder na água para caçar presas desprevenidas. Para nadar rápido, move suas orelhas para manter o equilíbrio.

9.name: blastoise
9.description: Um Pokémon brutal com jatos de água pressurizada em sua casca. Eles são usados para tackles de alta velocidade.

10.name: caterpie
10.description: Seus pés curtos têm ventosas que permitem que ele suba sem descanso por rampas e paredes.

11.name: metapod
11.description: Este Pokémon é vulnerável ao ataque enquanto sua casca está macia, expondo seu corpo fraco e sensível.

12.name: butterfree
12.description: Em batalha, ele bate suas asas em alta velocidade para liberar pó altamente tóxico no ar.

13.name: weedle
13.description: Frequentemente encontrado em florestas, comendo folhas. Tem um agudo ferrão venenoso na cabeça.

14.name: kakuna
14.description: Quase incapaz de se mover, este Pokémon só pode endurecer sua casca para se proteger de predadores.

15.name: beedrill
15.description: Possui três ferrões venenosos em suas patas dianteiras e na cauda. Eles são usados para picar seu inimigo repetidamente.

16.name: pidgey
16.description: Uma visão comum em florestas e bosques. Ele bate suas asas ao nível do chão para levantar areia cegante.

17.name: pidgeotto
17.description: Muito protetor de sua vasta área territorial, este Pokémon picará ferozmente qualquer intruso.

18.name: pidgeot
18.description: Quando caça, ele passa rapidamente sobre a superfície da água para pegar presas desprevenidas como o Magikarp.

19.name: rattata
19.description: Morde qualquer coisa quando ataca. Pequeno e muito rápido, é uma visão comum em muitos lugares.

20.name: raticate
20.description: Usa seus bigodes para manter seu equilíbrio. Parece desacelerar se eles forem cortados.

21.name: spearow
21.description: Bate suas pequenas asas ocupadamente para voar. Usando seu bico, procura presas na grama.

22.name: fearow
22.description: Com suas enormes e magníficas asas, pode manter-se no ar sem nunca precisar pousar para descansar.

23.name: ekans
23.description: Move-se silenciosamente e sorrateiramente. Come ovos de aves como Pidgey e Spearow inteiros.

24.name: arbok
24.description: Diz-se que as ferozes marcas de advertência em sua barriga variam de área para área.

25.name: pikachu
25.description: Quando vários destes Pokémon se reúnem, sua eletricidade pode se acumular e causar tempestades de raios.

26.name: raichu
26.description: Sua longa cauda serve como um aterramento para se proteger de seu próprio poder de alta voltagem.

27.name: sandshrew
27.description: Cava profundamente no subsolo em locais áridos, longe da água. Só emerge para caçar comida.

28.name: sandslash
28.description: Enrola-se em uma bola espinhosa quando ameaçado. Pode rolar enquanto está enrolado para atacar ou escapar.

29.name: nidoran-f
29.description: Embora pequeno, seus espinhos venenosos tornam este Pokémon perigoso. A fêmea tem chifres menores.

30.name: nidorina
30.description: O chifre da fêmea se desenvolve lentamente. Prefere ataques físicos como arranhar e morder.

31.name: nidoqueen
31.description: Suas escamas duras fornecem forte proteção. Usa sua robustez para executar movimentos poderosos.

32.name: nidoran-m
32.description: Endurece suas orelhas para sentir o perigo. Quanto maiores seus chifres, mais poderoso é o veneno que secreta.

33.name: nidorino
33.description: Um Pokémon agressivo que é rápido para atacar. O chifre em sua cabeça secreta um veneno poderoso.

34.name: nidoking
34.description: Usa sua cauda poderosa em batalha para esmagar, apertar e depois quebrar os ossos da presa.

35.name: clefairy
35.description: Seu apelo mágico e fofo tem muitos admiradores. É raro e encontrado apenas em certas áreas.

36.name: clefable
36.description: Um Pokémon fada tímido que raramente é visto. Fugirá assim que sentir a presença de pessoas.

37.name: vulpix
37.description: No momento do nascimento, tem apenas uma cauda. A cauda se divide a partir da ponta à medida que cresce.

38.name: ninetales
38.description: Muito inteligente e muito vingativa. Agarrar uma de suas muitas caudas pode resultar em uma maldição de 1000 anos.

39.name: jigglypuff
39.description: Quando seus enormes olhos brilham, ela canta uma melodia misteriosamente suave que adormece seus inimigos.

40.name: wigglytuff
40.description: O corpo é macio e borrachudo. Quando irritada, ela sopra o ar e se infla para um tamanho enorme.

41.name: zubat
41.description: Forma colônias em lugares perpetuamente escuros. Usa ondas ultrassônicas para identificar e se aproximar de alvos.

42.name: golbat
42.description: Uma vez que ataca, não para de drenar energia da vítima, mesmo que se torne muito pesado para voar.

43.name: oddish
43.description: Durante o dia, mantém seu rosto enterrado no chão. À noite, vagueia por aí semeando suas sementes.

44.name: gloom
44.description: O fluido que escorre de sua boca não é saliva. É um néctar usado para atrair presas.

45.name: vileplume
45.description: Ela tem as pétalas maiores do mundo. A cada passo, as pétalas liberam pesadas nuvens de pólen tóxico.

46.name: paras
46.description: Cava para sugar raízes de árvores. Os cogumelos em suas costas crescem ao absorver nutrientes do hospedeiro inseto.

47.name: parasect
47.description: Uma dupla hospedeiro-parasita, onde o cogumelo parasita assumiu o controle do inseto hospedeiro. Prefere lugares úmidos.

48.name: venonat
48.description: Vive nas sombras de árvores altas, onde come insetos. Fica atraída pela luz à noite.

49.name: venomoth
49.description: As escamas semelhantes a pó que cobrem suas asas são coloridas para indicar os tipos de veneno que ela possui.

50.name: diglett
50.description: Vive a cerca de um metro subterrâneo, onde se alimenta de raízes de plantas. Às vezes aparece acima do solo.

51.name: dugtrio
51.description: Uma equipe de três DIGLETTs. Provoca enormes terremotos ao cavar a 100 quilômetros de profundidade.

52.name: meowth
52.description: Ela lava seu rosto regularmente para manter a moeda em sua testa impecável. Não se dá bem com o Meowth de Galar.

53.name: persian
53.description: Embora seu pelo tenha muitos admiradores, é difícil criá-la como pet devido à sua natureza volúvel e maldosa.

54.name: psyduck
54.description: Incrivelmente lento e meio desajeitado. Demora 5 segundos para sentir dor quando está sendo atacado.

55.name: golduck
55.description: Frequentemente vista nadando elegantemente nas margens de lagos. Muitas vezes é confundida com o monstro japonês, Kappa.

56.name: mankey
56.description: Extremamente rápido para ficar irritado. Pode ser dócil em um momento, mas logo começa a se debater no próximo.

57.name: primeape
57.description: Sempre furiosa e obstinada. Não abandonará a perseguição até que sua presa seja capturada.

58.name: growlithe
58.description: Muito protetora de seu território. Ela late e morde para repelir intrusos de seu espaço.

59.name: arcanine
59.description: Um Pokémon admirado desde os tempos antigos por sua beleza. Corre agilmente como se tivesse asas.

60.name: poliwag
60.description: Suas pernas recém-crescidas dificultam sua corrida. Parece preferir nadar a tentar ficar em pé.

61.name: poliwhirl
61.description: Capaz de viver tanto em água quanto fora dela. Quando fora d'água, sua pele suada mantém seu corpo viscoso.

62.name: poliwrath
62.description: Um nadador habilidoso tanto no estilo crawl quanto no peito. Facilmente ultrapassa os melhores nadadores humanos.

63.name: abra
63.description: Usando sua habilidade de ler mentes, ele identificará o perigo iminente e TELEPORTARÁ para a segurança.

64.name: kadabra
64.description: Emite ondas alfa especiais de seu corpo que induzem dores de cabeça só de estar perto.

65.name: alakazam
65.description: Seu cérebro pode superar um supercomputador. Seu QI é dito ser 5.000.

66.name: machop
66.description: Ama desenvolver seus músculos. Treina em todos os estilos de artes marciais para se tornar ainda mais forte.

67.name: machoke
67.description: Seu corpo muscular é tão poderoso que ele deve usar um cinto especial para regular seus movimentos.

68.name: machamp
68.description: Usando seus músculos pesados, ele dá socos poderosos que podem lançar a vítima para longe, além do horizonte.

69.name: bellsprout
69.description: Um Pokémon carnívoro que captura e come insetos. Usa suas raízes para absorver a umidade necessária.

70.name: weepinbell
70.description: Ela cospe PÓS-veneno para imobilizar o inimigo e depois o finaliza com um spray de ÁCIDO.

71.name: victreebel
71.description: Diz-se que vive em enormes colônias nas profundezas das selvas, embora ninguém tenha retornado de lá.

72.name: tentacool
72.description: Flutua em mares rasos. Pescadores que a fisgam por acidente costumam ser punidos pelo seu ácido venenoso.

73.name: tentacruel
73.description: As tentáculos são normalmente mantidos curtos. Durante a caça, eles são estendidos para capturar e imobilizar presas.

74.name: geodude
74.description: Encontrado em campos e montanhas. Confundido com pedras, as pessoas frequentemente pisam ou tropeçam nele.

75.name: graveler
75.description: Rola pelas encostas para se mover. Ela rola por qualquer obstáculo sem diminuir a velocidade ou mudar de direção.

76.name: golem
76.description: Seu corpo rochoso é extremamente duro. Ele pode facilmente resistir a explosões de dinamite sem sofrer danos.

77.name: ponyta
77.description: Suas cascos são 10 vezes mais duros que diamantes. Ela pode atropelar qualquer coisa e deixá-la completamente plana em pouco tempo.

78.name: rapidash
78.description: Muito competitiva, esta Pokémon persegue qualquer coisa que se mova rápido na esperança de correr junto.

79.name: slowpoke
79.description: Incrivelmente lento e desajeitado. Leva 5 segundos para sentir dor quando está sendo atacado.

80.name: slowbro
80.description: O SHELLDER que se prende à cauda de SLOWPOKE se alimenta das sobras deixadas pelo hospedeiro.

81.name: magnemite
81.description: Gira a uma velocidade incrível. Magnetos em seu corpo podem atrair metais e objetos ao seu redor.

82.name: magneton
82.description: A fusão de três Magnemites cria este Pokémon de força elétrica intensa. Usa essa energia para se proteger.

83.name: farfetch'd
83.description: Sempre carrega um alho-poró. Diz-se que só é capaz de lutar com ele de forma eficaz, como uma espada.

84.name: doduo
84.description: Aperta suas cabeças para discutir o melhor caminho a seguir. São rápidos em corredores, mas não muito inteligentes.

85.name: dodrio
85.description: O Pokémon de três cabeças que corre em alta velocidade e usa suas cabeças para formar um plano coordenado.

86.name: seel
86.description: Mora em zonas polares, nadando por grandes distâncias em busca de comida. Sua pele é suave e lisa como uma esponja.

87.name: dewgong
87.description: Passa a maior parte de seu tempo nas águas geladas. Usa suas habilidades subaquáticas para caçar peixe.

88.name: grimer
88.description: Sua substância viscosa causa poluição. Está sempre à procura de lixo para se alimentar.

89.name: muk
89.description: Sua massa viscosa é usada para consumir e digerir tudo o que encontra. Tende a crescer rapidamente se não for contida.

90.name: shellder
90.description: Aperta sua concha com força para se proteger de qualquer perigo. Muitas vezes é confundido com uma pedra.

91.name: cloyster
91.description: Sua concha dura protege seu corpo de ataques. Se a concha é aberta, sua boca pode liberar uma descarga poderosa.

92.name: gastly
92.description: Feito de uma nuvem de gás venenoso, se dissolve quando é atingido por um ataque de luz.

93.name: haunter
93.description: É capaz de controlar os medos das pessoas. Vem às vezes para brincar com aqueles que se assustam facilmente.

94.name: gengar
94.description: O Pokémon Fantasma que adora assustar e brincar com seus inimigos. Pode se esconder nas sombras sem ser visto.

95.name: onix
95.description: Composta de rochas e pedras, sua aparência é fria e intimidadora. Pode se mover a uma grande velocidade.

96.name: steelix
96.description: Com seu corpo de aço sólido, é imune a ataques físicos e pode perfurar qualquer coisa que estiver em seu caminho.

97.name: drowzee
97.description: Esse Pokémon usa ondas cerebrais para hipnotizar suas presas e induzir um sono profundo.

98.name: hypno
98.description: Com sua habilidade hipnótica, pode controlar as mentes das pessoas e induzir sonhos ou pesadelos.

99.name: krabby
99.description: Usa suas pinças fortes para caçar presas. No entanto, tem um temperamento explosivo e uma grande fome.

100.name: kingler
100.description: Suas pinças são tão fortes que podem quebrar rochas com um único golpe. Eles crescem mais a cada troca de pele.

101.name: exeggcute
101.description: Com aparência de ovos, seus membros podem se agrupar e lançar poderosos ataques psíquicos.

102.name: exeggutor
102.description: Possui uma cabeça que pode gerar poderes psíquicos. Usado como um símbolo de sabedoria, é um Pokémon muito respeitado.

103.name: cubone
103.description: Carrega um osso como se fosse sua espada. Após perder sua mãe, ele carrega a dor em sua luta.

104.name: marowak
104.description: Após amadurecer, esse Pokémon vai dominar a arte de lutar com o osso. Seu poder de ataque é devastador.

105.name: hitmonlee
105.description: Esse Pokémon de artes marciais pode acertar seus oponentes com chutes tão rápidos que são invisíveis.

106.name: hitmonchan
106.description: Seu estilo de luta é baseado em socos poderosos. Com velocidade e precisão, ele pode derrubar qualquer adversário.

107.name: lickitung
107.description: Tem uma língua extremamente longa que pode usar para pegar alimentos de lugares distantes ou atacar seus inimigos.

108.name: lickilicky
108.description: Sua língua é uma das mais poderosas do mundo, capaz de pegar objetos de longa distância e em alta velocidade.

109.name: koffing
109.description: Solta fumaça venenosa por seus poros. Sua presença é muito perigosa devido ao veneno altamente tóxico.

110.name: weezing
110.description: O gás tóxico liberado por esse Pokémon é perigoso para a saúde e pode até intoxicar em grandes quantidades.

111.name: rhyhorn
111.description: Sua pele dura e chifres poderosos tornam-no um oponente formidável, capaz de destruir qualquer obstáculo.

112.name: rhydon
112.description: Este Pokémon possui um grande chifre e uma pele espessa, podendo derrubar árvores e pedras com facilidade.

113.name: chansey
113.description: Este Pokémon é muito carinhoso e cuida dos outros com carinho. Ele é conhecido por sua habilidade de curar feridas.

114.name: blissey
114.description: Com seu grande coração, este Pokémon é conhecido por sua habilidade em curar feridas e trazer felicidade para as pessoas.

115.name: tangela
115.description: Com um corpo coberto por cipós, Tangela se esconde na vegetação e pode atacar seus inimigos com força.

116.name: tangrowth
116.description: Seu corpo é coberto por grandes cipós que podem usar como tentáculos para capturar presas.

117.name: seaking
117.description: Com suas barbatanas longas, ele nada por águas profundas e é conhecido por sua habilidade de ataque em combate.

118.name: staryu
118.description: Esse Pokémon aquático brilha de forma cintilante à noite. Possui a capacidade de regenerar partes do seu corpo.

119.name: starmie
119.description: É a evolução de Staryu e possui habilidades psíquicas que a tornam ainda mais poderosa e difícil de vencer.

120.name: mr.mime
120.description: Ele cria barreiras invisíveis com suas mãos e é um mestre do disfarce, usando sua habilidade de manipulação mental.

121.name: scyther
121.description: Um mestre do combate, com lâminas afiadas em suas mãos, Scyther é um oponente rápido e letal em batalhas.

122.name: jynx
122.description: Com poderes psíquicos, Jynx encanta seus inimigos, mas também pode se tornar uma ameaça com suas habilidades congelantes.

123.name: electabuzz
123.description: Com energia elétrica em seus corpos, os Electabuzz podem lançar poderosos ataques elétricos e se movem a grande velocidade.

124.name: magmar
124.description: Com um corpo de fogo, Magmar é capaz de gerar calor intenso que o torna um oponente formidável em combate.

125.name: pinsir
125.description: Com suas mandíbulas poderosas e seu corpo musculoso, Pinsir é um Pokémon de combate imbatível em lutas corpo a corpo.

126.name: magmar
126.description: Seu corpo sempre arde com um brilho laranja que lhe permite se esconder perfeitamente entre as chamas.

127.name: pinsir
127.description: Se não conseguir esmagar a vítima em suas pinças, ele a balançará e a jogará com força.

128.name: tauros
128.description: Quando mira um inimigo, ele carrega furiosamente enquanto chicoteia seu corpo com suas caudas longas.

129.name: magikarp
129.description: No passado distante, era um pouco mais forte do que os descendentes horrivelmente fracos que existem hoje.

130.name: gyarados
130.description: Uma vez que começa a se enfurecer, um GYARADOS queimará tudo, mesmo em uma tempestade violenta.

131.name: lapras
131.description: Um POKéMON que foi caçado até quase a extinção. Pode transportar pessoas pela água.

132.name: ditto
132.description: Capaz de copiar o código genético de um inimigo para se transformar instantaneamente em um duplicado do inimigo.

133.name: eevee
133.description: Seu código genético é irregular. Pode mutar se for exposto à radiação de pedras elementares.

134.name: vaporeon
134.description: Vive perto da água. Sua cauda longa é enrugada com uma barbatana que muitas vezes é confundida com a de uma sereia.

135.name: jolteon
135.description: Acumula íons negativos na atmosfera para disparar raios de 10.000 volts.

136.name: flareon
136.description: Ao armazenar energia térmica em seu corpo, sua temperatura pode subir para mais de 1600 graus.

137.name: porygon
137.description: Um POKéMON que consiste inteiramente em código de programação. Capaz de se mover livremente no ciberespaço.

138.name: omanyte
138.description: Embora extinto há muito tempo, em casos raros, pode ser ressuscitado geneticamente a partir de fósseis.

139.name: omastar
139.description: Um POKéMON pré-histórico que morreu quando sua pesada concha tornou impossível capturar presas.

140.name: kabuto
140.description: Um POKéMON que foi ressuscitado a partir de um fóssil encontrado no que já foi o fundo do oceano há eras.

141.name: kabutops
141.description: Sua forma elegante é perfeita para nadar. Ele corta as presas com suas garras e drena os fluidos corporais.

142.name: aerodactyl
142.description: Um Pokémon que vagou pelos céus na era dos dinossauros. Seus dentes são como lâminas de serra.

143.name: snorlax
143.description: Muito preguiçoso. Apenas come e dorme. À medida que seu volume cresce, ele se torna cada vez mais indolente.

144.name: articuno
144.description: Um lendário POKéMON pássaro que se diz aparecer para pessoas condenadas que estão perdidas em montanhas geladas.

145.name: zapdos
145.description: Um lendário POKéMON pássaro que se diz aparecer das nuvens enquanto lança enormes raios.

146.name: moltres
146.description: Conhecido como o lendário pássaro do fogo. Cada batida de suas asas cria um brilho deslumbrante de chamas.

147.name: dratini
147.description: Considerado por muito tempo um POKéMON mítico até recentemente, quando uma pequena colônia foi encontrada vivendo debaixo d'água.

148.name: dragonair
148.description: Um POKéMON místico que exala uma aura gentil. Tem a capacidade de mudar as condições climáticas.

149.name: dragonite
149.description: Um POKéMON marinho extremamente raro. Diz-se que sua inteligência é igual à dos humanos.

150.name: mewtwo
150.description: Foi criado por um cientista após anos de horríveis experimentos de manipulação genética e engenharia de DNA.

151.name: mew
151.description: Tão raro que ainda é considerado uma miragem por muitos especialistas. Poucas pessoas o viram em todo o mundo.

152.name: chikorita
152.description: Um aroma doce emana suavemente da folha em sua cabeça. É dócil e adora tomar sol.

153.name: bayleef
153.description: O aroma de especiarias vem de seu pescoço. De alguma forma, cheirá-lo faz você querer lutar.

154.name: meganium
154.description: O aroma que emana de suas pétalas contém uma substância que acalma os sentimentos agressivos.

155.name: cyndaquil
155.description: Tem uma natureza tímida. Se for assustado, as chamas em suas costas queimam mais vigorosamente.

156.name: quilava
156.description: Cuidado se ele virar as costas durante a batalha. Significa que ele atacará com o fogo em suas costas.

157.name: typhlosion
157.description: Se sua raiva atingir o pico, ele fica tão quente que qualquer coisa que o toque instantaneamente pegará fogo.

158.name: totodile
158.description: Suas mandíbulas bem desenvolvidas são poderosas e capazes de esmagar qualquer coisa. Mesmo seu treinador deve ter cuidado.

159.name: croconaw
159.description: Se perder uma presa, uma nova cresce em seu lugar. Há sempre 48 presas alinhando sua boca.

160.name: feraligatr
160.description: Quando morde com suas mandíbulas poderosas e maciças, ele sacude a cabeça e dilacera brutalmente sua vítima.

161.name: sentret
161.description: Um POKéMON muito cauteloso, ele se ergue usando sua cauda para ter uma melhor visão de seus arredores.

162.name: furret
162.description: Faz um ninho adequado ao seu corpo longo e magro. O ninho é impossível para outros POKéMON entrarem.

163.name: hoothoot
163.description: Sempre fica em uma perna só. Ele muda de perna tão rápido que o movimento raramente pode ser visto.

164.name: noctowl
164.description: Seus olhos são especialmente adaptados. Eles concentram até mesmo a luz fraca e permitem que ele veja no escuro.

165.name: ledyba
165.description: É muito tímido. Fica com medo de se mover se estiver sozinho. Mas será ativo se estiver em grupo.

166.name: ledian
166.description: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

167.name: spinarak
167.description: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

168.name: ariados
168.description: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.

169.name: crobat
169.description: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

170.name: chinchou
170.description: Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one another to claim their respective turf.

171.name: lanturn
171.description: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea's surface from a depth of over three miles.

172.name: pichu
172.description: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

173.name: cleffa
173.description: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

174.name: igglybuff
174.description: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

175.name: togepi
175.description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

176.name: togetic
176.description: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

177.name: natu
177.description: It sits on tree branches, observing the surroundings. It is said to be able to foretell the future.

178.name: xatu
178.description: With its ability to see both the past and future, it is said that this POKéMON can see beyond time itself.

179.name: mareep
179.description: The fluffy coat of this Pokémon is a natural insulator that keeps its body temperature from falling.

180.name: flaaffy
180.description: Because its rubbery body can store electricity, it can expel the energy stored in its wool.

181.name: ampharos
181.description: This Pokémon can be found standing still, waiting for the opportunity to gather electricity.

182.name: bellossom
182.description:
Plentiful in the tropics. When it
dances, its petals rub together and
make a pleasant ringing sound.

183.name: marill
183.description:
The tip of its
tail, which con­
tains oil that is lighter than wa­
ter, lets it swim
without drowning.

184.name: azumarill
184.description:
It lives in water virtually all day long.
Its body color and pattern act as
camouflage that makes it tough for
enemies to spot in water.

185.name: sudowoodo
185.description:
Although it always
pretends to be a
tree, its composi­ tion appears to be
closer to a rock
than a plant.

186.name: politoed
186.description:
If POLIWAG and
POLIWHIRL hear its
echoing cry, they respond by gather­
ing from far and
wide.

187.name: hoppip
187.description:
To keep from being
blown away by the
wind, they gather in clusters. They
do enjoy gentle
breezes, though.

188.name: skiploom
188.description:
The bloom on top
of its head opens
and closes as the temperature fluc­
tuates up and
down.

189.name: jumpluff
189.description:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls its cotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

190.name: aipom
190.description:
Its tail is so
powerful that it
can use it to grab a tree branch and
hold itself up in
the air.

191.name: sunkern
191.description:
It may drop out of
the sky suddenly.
If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will
violently shake
its leaves.

192.name: sunflora
192.description:
It converts sun­
light into energy.
In the darkness after sunset, it
closes its petals
and becomes still.

193.name: yanma
193.description:
If it flaps its
wings really fast,
it can generate shock waves that
will shatter win­
dows in the area.

194.name: wooper
194.description:
This POKéMON lives
in cold water. It
will leave the water to search
for food when it
gets cold outside.

195.name: quagsire
195.description:
This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

196.name: espeon
196.description:
It uses the fine
hair that covers
its body to sense air currents and
predict its ene­
my's actions.

197.name: umbreon
197.description:
When agitated,
this POKéMON pro­
tects itself by spraying poisonous
sweat from its
pores.

198.name: murkrow
198.description:
Feared and loathed
by many, it is
believed to bring misfortune to all
those who see it
at night.

199.name: slowking
199.description:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

200.name: misdreavus
200.description:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

201.name: unown
201.description:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.

202.name: wobbuffet
202.description:
It hates light and
shock. If attack­
ed, it inflates its body to pump
up its counter­
strike.

203.name: girafarig
203.description:
Its tail has a
small brain of its
own. Beware! If you get close, it
may react to your
scent and bite.

204.name: pineco
204.description:
It likes to make
its shell thicker
by adding layers of tree bark. The
additional weight
doesn't bother it.

205.name: forretress
205.description:
Its entire body is
shielded by a
steel-hard shell. What lurks inside
the armor is a
total mystery.

206.name: dunsparce
206.description:
When spotted, this
POKéMON escapes
backward by furi­ ously boring into
the ground with
its tail.

207.name: gligar
207.description:
It flies straight
at its target's
face then clamps down on the star­
tled victim to
inject poison.

208.name: steelix
208.description:
It is thought its body transformed
as a result of iron accumulating
internally from swallowing soil.

209.name: snubbull
209.description:
Although it looks
frightening, it is
actually kind and affectionate. It
is very popular
among women.

210.name: granbull
210.description:
It is actually
timid and easily
spooked. If at­ tacked, it flails
about to fend off
its attacker.

211.name: qwilfish
211.description:
To fire its poison
spikes, it must
inflate its body by drinking over
2.6 gallons of
water all at once.

212.name: scizor
212.description:
It has a steel-hard body. It
intimidates foes by upraising its
eye-patterned pincers.

213.name: shuckle
213.description:
The BERRIES it
stores in its
vase-like shell decompose and
become a gooey
liquid.

214.name: heracross
214.description:
It is usually docile, but if it is
disturbed while sipping honey,
it chases off the intruder with its horn.

215.name: sneasel
215.description:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

216.name: teddiursa
216.description:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

217.name: ursaring
217.description:
Although it is a
good climber, it
prefers to snap trees with its
forelegs and eat
fallen BERRIES.

218.name: slugma
218.description:
It never sleeps.
It has to keep
moving because if it stopped, its
magma body would
cool and harden.

219.name: magcargo
219.description:
The shell on its
back is just skin
that has cooled and hardened. It
breaks easily with
a slight touch.

220.name: swinub
220.description:
It rubs its snout
on the ground to
find and dig up food. It sometimes
discovers hot
springs.

221.name: piloswine
221.description:
Because the long
hair all over its
body obscures its sight, it just
keeps charging
repeatedly.

222.name: corsola
222.description:
It continuously
sheds and grows.
The tip of its head is prized as
a treasure for its
beauty.

223.name: remoraid
223.description:
It has superb ac­
curacy. The water
it shoots out can strike even moving
prey from more
than 300 feet.

224.name: octillery
224.description:
It traps enemies
with its suction-
cupped tentacles then smashes them
with its rock-hard
head.

225.name: delibird
225.description:
It carries food
all day long.
There are tales about lost people
who were saved by
the food it had.

226.name: mantine
226.description:
As it majestically
swims, it doesn't
care if REMORAID attach to it for
scavenging its
leftovers.

227.name: skarmory
227.description:
Its sturdy wings
look heavy, but
they are actually hollow and light,
allowing it to fly
freely in the sky.

228.name: houndour
228.description:
It uses different
kinds of cries for
communicating with others of its kind
and for pursuing
its prey.

229.name: houndoom
229.description:
If you are burned
by the flames it
shoots from its mouth, the pain
will never go
away.

230.name: kingdra
230.description:
It is said that it
usually hides in
underwater caves. It can create
whirlpools by
yawning.

231.name: phanpy
231.description:
It swings its long
snout around play­
fully, but because it is so strong,
that can be dan­
gerous.

232.name: donphan
232.description:
It has sharp, hard
tusks and a rugged
hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough
to knock down a
house.

233.name: porygon2
233.description:
This upgraded
version of PORYGON
is designed for space exploration.
It can't fly,
though.

234.name: stantler
234.description:
The curved antlers
subtly change the
flow of air to create a strange
space where real­
ity is distorted.

235.name: smeargle
235.description:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

236.name: tyrogue
236.description:
It is always
bursting with en­
ergy. To make it­ self stronger, it
keeps on fighting
even if it loses.

237.name: hitmontop
237.description:
If you become
enchanted by its
smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks,
you may get
drilled hard.

238.name: smoochum
238.description:
Its lips are the
most sensitive
parts on its body. It always uses its
lips first to
examine things.

239.name: elekid
239.description:
It rotates its
arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it charges up
only a little bit.

240.name: magby
240.description:
Each and every
time it inhales
and exhales, hot embers dribble out
of its mouth and
nostrils.

241.name: miltank
241.description:
Its milk is packed
with nutrition,
making it the ultimate beverage
for the sick or
weary.

242.name: blissey
242.description:
Anyone who takes
even one bite of
BLISSEY's egg be­ comes unfailingly
caring and pleas­
ant to everyone.

243.name: raikou
243.description:
The rain clouds it
carries let it
fire thunderbolts at will. They say
that it descended
with lightning.

244.name: entei
244.description:
Volcanoes erupt
when it barks. Un­
able to restrain its extreme power,
it races headlong
around the land.

245.name: suicune
245.description:
It races around the world to
purify fouled water. It dashes
away with the north wind.

246.name: larvitar
246.description:
It feeds on soil.
After it has eaten
a large mountain, it will fall
asleep so it can
grow.

247.name: pupitar
247.description:
Its shell is as
hard as sheet
rock, and it is also very strong.
Its THRASHING can
topple a mountain.

248.name: tyranitar
248.description:
Its body can't be
harmed by any sort
of attack, so it is very eager to
make challenges
against enemies.

249.name: lugia
249.description:
It is said that it
quietly spends its
time deep at the bottom of the sea
because its powers
are too strong.

250.name: ho-oh
250.description:
Legends claim this
POKéMON flies the
world's skies con­ tinuously on its
magnificent seven-
colored wings.

251.name: celebi
251.description:
This POKéMON wan­
ders across time.
Grass and trees flourish in the
forests in which
it has appeared.

252.name: treecko
252.description:
TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom
of its feet that enable it to scale
vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes
with its thick tail.

253.name: grovyle
253.description:
The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s
body are convenient for camouflaging
it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing
trees in jungles.

254.name: sceptile
254.description:
The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body
are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is
very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe
from above or behind.

255.name: torchic
255.description:
TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER,
following behind with unsteady
steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over
1,800 degrees F, including fireballs
that leave the foe scorched black.

256.name: combusken
256.description:
COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and
thighs by running through fields and
mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed
and power, enabling it to dole out ten
kicks in one second.

257.name: blaziken
257.description:
In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense
flames from its wrists and attacks foes
courageously. The stronger the foe, the more
intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.

258.name: mudkip
258.description:
The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly
sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense
movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking
place around it without using its eyes.

259.name: marshtomp
259.description:
The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is
enveloped by a thin, sticky film that
enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches
when the ocean tide is low.

260.name: swampert
260.description:
SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough
power to easily drag a boulder weighing
more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision
that lets it see even in murky water.

261.name: poochyena
261.description:
At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite
at anything that moves.
This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted.
However, it may turn tail if the prey
strikes back.

262.name: mightyena
262.description:
MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when
it is preparing to attack. It starts to
growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its
sharply pointed fangs.

263.name: zigzagoon
263.description:
ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders
everywhere at all times. This POKéMON
does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything
that it happens to see.

264.name: linoone
264.description:
LINOONE always runs full speed and only
in straight lines. If facing an obstacle,
it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by
gently curving roads.

265.name: wurmple
265.description:
Using the spikes on its rear end,  
WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and
feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with
suction pads that allow it to cling to
glass without slipping.

266.name: silcoon
266.description:
SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch
using silk to keep from falling. There, 
this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution.
It peers out of the silk cocoon through
a small hole.

267.name: beautifly
267.description:
BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet
pollen of flowers. If you want to see
this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY
is sure to come looking for pollen.

268.name: cascoon
268.description:
CASCOON makes its protective cocoon
by wrapping its body entirely with a
fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens.
This POKéMON prepares for its evolution
inside the cocoon.

269.name: dustox
269.description:
DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light.
Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted
by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the
leaves off roadside trees for food.

270.name: lotad
270.description:
It searches about for clean water. If it does not
drink water for too long, the leaf on its head wilts.

271.name: lombre
271.description:
It lives at the water’s edge where it is
sunny. It sleeps on a bed of water grass
by day and becomes active at night.

272.name: ludicolo
272.description:
LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as
it hears cheerful, festive music.
This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking
outings.

273.name: seedot
273.description:
SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree
branch using the top of its head.
It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch.
The more water it drinks, the glossier
this POKéMON’s body becomes.

274.name: nuzleaf
274.description:
NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown
forests. They occasionally venture out
of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long
nose pinched.

275.name: shiftry
275.description:
It lives quietly in the deep forest.
It is said to create chilly winter
winds with the fans it holds.

276.name: taillow
276.description:
TAILLOW courageously stands its
ground against foes, however strong
they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant
even after a loss. On the other hand,
it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.

277.name: swellow
277.description:
SWELLOW flies high above our heads,
making graceful arcs in the sky.
This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless
prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s
clawed feet, preventing escape.

278.name: wingull
278.description:
WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey
and valuables in its beak and hiding
them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies
as if it were skating across the sky.

279.name: pelipper
279.description:
It is a messenger of the skies,
carrying small Pokémon and
eggs to safety in its bill.

280.name: ralts
280.description:
RALTS senses the emotions of
people using the horns on its head.
This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws
closer if it senses that the person has
a positive disposition.

281.name: kirlia
281.description:
It is said that a KIRLIA that is
exposed to the positive emotions of
its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic
powers with its highly developed brain.

282.name: gardevoir
282.description:
GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the
future. If it senses impending danger
to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at
full power.

283.name: surskit
283.description:
From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT
secretes an oil that enables it to walk
on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic
organisms in ponds and lakes.

284.name: masquerain
284.description:
MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with
the eyelike patterns on its antennas.
This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even
sideways and backwards - as if it were
a helicopter.

285.name: shroomish
285.description:
SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark
depths of forests. They are often
found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that
is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

286.name: breloom
286.description:
BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light
and sprightly footwork, then throws
punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts
boxers to shame.

287.name: slakoth
287.description:
SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty
hours every day. Because it moves so
little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists
of just three leaves.

288.name: vigoroth
288.description:
VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated
to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t
tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it
can’t be moving constantly.

289.name: slaking
289.description:
SLAKING spends all day lying down and
lolling about.
It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach,
this POKéMON reluctantly moves to
another spot.

290.name: nincada
290.description:
NINCADA lives underground for many
years in complete darkness.
This POKéMON absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless
as it waits for evolution.

291.name: ninjask
291.description:
NINJASK moves around at such a high
speed that it cannot be seen, even
while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long
believed to be invisible.

292.name: shedinja
292.description:
SHEDINJA’s hard body doesn’t move -
not even a twitch. In fact, its body
appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this POKéMON will
steal the spirit of anyone peering into
its hollow body from its back.

293.name: whismur
293.description:
Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet -
it is barely audible even if one is
paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger,
it starts crying at an earsplitting
volume.

294.name: loudred
294.description:
LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely
decimate a wood-frame house. It uses
its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as
loudspeakers.

295.name: exploud
295.description:
EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the
tremors it creates by bellowing. If this
POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is
preparing to let loose a huge bellow.

296.name: makuhita
296.description:
MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep
getting up and attacking its foe
however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this
POKéMON stores more energy in its body
for evolving.

297.name: hariyama
297.description:
It has the habit of challenging others
without hesitation to tests of strength.
It’s been known to stand on train tracks
and stop trains using forearm thrusts.

298.name: azurill
298.description:
A Pokémon that lives by water.
It moves quickly on land by
bouncing on its big tail.

299.name: nosepass
299.description:
NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always
pointed to the north. If two of these
POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they
are close because their magnetic noses
repel one another.

300.name: skitty
300.description:
SKITTY has the habit of becoming
fascinated by moving objects and
chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after
its own tail and become dizzy.

301.name: delcatty
301.description:
DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered
existence in which it can do as it
pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps
whenever it decides, its daily routines
are completely random.

302.name: sableye
302.description:
SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside
caverns. They are feared, however,
because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their
eyes burn with a sinister glow in the
darkness.

303.name: mawile
303.description:
MAWHILE’s huge jaws are actually steel
horns that have been transformed.
Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard.
When the foe least expects it, MAWHILE
chomps it with its gaping jaws.

304.name: aron
304.description:
This POKéMON has a body of steel.
To make its body, ARON feeds on
iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by
eating bridges and rails.

305.name: lairon
305.description:
LAIRON tempers its steel body by
drinking highly nutritious mineral
springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to
springs of delicious water.

306.name: aggron
306.description:
AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its
own territory. It mercilessly beats up
anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its
territory at all times.

307.name: meditite
307.description:
MEDITITE undertakes rigorous mental
training deep in the mountains.
However, whenever it meditates, this POKéMON always loses its concentration
and focus. As a result, its training
never ends.

308.name: medicham
308.description:
It is said that through meditation,
MEDICHAM heightens energy inside
its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by
merging itself with fields and
mountains.

309.name: electrike
309.description:
ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its
long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates
its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs
explosive acceleration performance.

310.name: manectric
310.description:
MANECTRIC is constantly discharging
electricity from its mane. The sparks
sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON
creates thunderclouds.

311.name: plusle
311.description:
PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader
for its partners. Whenever a teammate
puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create
the crackling noises of sparks to show
its joy.

312.name: minun
312.description:
MINUN is more concerned about cheering
on its partners than its own safety.
It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of
sparks to cheer on its teammates.

313.name: volbeat
313.description:
With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits
light from its tail. It communicates with
others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light.
This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet
aroma of ILLUMISE.

314.name: illumise
314.description:
With its sweet aroma, it guides
Volbeat to draw signs with light in
the night sky.

315.name: roselia
315.description:
ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as
projectiles at any opponent that tries
to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings
serenity to living things.

316.name: gulpin
316.description:
Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its
stomach. As a result, it can swallow
something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a
special fluid that digests anything.

317.name: swalot
317.description:
When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out
a hideously toxic fluid from its pores
and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this
POKéMON gulps it down whole with its
cavernous mouth.

318.name: carvanha
318.description:
CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws
and its sharply pointed fangs pack the
destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and
sunk by this POKéMON.

319.name: sharpedo
319.description:
Nicknamed “the bully of the sea,”
SHARPEDO is widely feared.
Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off.
Just one of these POKéMON can
thoroughly tear apart a supertanker.

320.name: wailmer
320.description:
WAILMER’s nostrils are located above
its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves
to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body
out of its nostrils.

321.name: wailord
321.description:
WAILORD is the largest of all identified
POKéMON up to now.
This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive
amounts of food at once with its
enormous mouth.

322.name: numel
322.description:
NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it
doesn’t notice being hit. However, it
can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething
cauldron of boiling magma.

323.name: camerupt
323.description:
CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body.
Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses
through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this
POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the
superheated magma.

324.name: torkoal
324.description:
You can tell how it’s feeling by the smoke
spouting from its shell. Tremendous velocity
is a sign of good health.

325.name: spoink
325.description:
SPOINK bounces around on its tail.
The shock of its bouncing makes its
heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it
stops, its heart will stop.

326.name: grumpig
326.description:
GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its
body to amplify its psychic power waves
for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special
power, its snorting breath grows
labored.

327.name: spinda
327.description:
No two Spinda have the same
pattern of spots. Its tottering
step fouls the aim of foes.

328.name: trapinch
328.description:
TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like
pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently
waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength
to crush even boulders.

329.name: vibrava
329.description:
To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates
ultrasonic waves by vigorously making
its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so
powerful, they can bring on headaches
in people.

330.name: flygon
330.description:
FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental 
spirit of the desert.” Because its
flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a
sandstorm while flying.

331.name: cacnea
331.description:
CACNEA lives in arid locations such
as deserts. It releases a strong aroma
from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON
shoots sharp thorns from its body to
bring the victim down.

332.name: cacturne
332.description:
During the daytime, CACTURNE remains
unmoving so that it does not lose any
moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night
when the temperature drops.

333.name: swablu
333.description:
SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that
are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON
is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and
sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

334.name: altaria
334.description:
ALTARIA dances and wheels through the
sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds.
By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners
experience dreamy wonderment.

335.name: zangoose
335.description:
Memories of battling its arch-rival
SEVIPER are etched into every cell of
ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks
with incredible agility.

336.name: seviper
336.description:
SEVIPER shares a generations-long
feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its
body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-
edged tail.

337.name: lunatone
337.description:
LUNATONE was discovered at a location
where a meteorite fell. As a result, some
people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has
been able to prove this theory so far.

338.name: solrock
338.description:
Solar energy is the source of its power,
so it is strong during the daytime.
When it spins, its body shines.

339.name: barboach
339.description:
BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve
as a superb radar system.
This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits
for prey to come along.

340.name: whiscash
340.description:
WHISCASH is extremely territorial.
Just one of these POKéMON will claim a
large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes
about and triggers a massive
earthquake.

341.name: corphish
341.description:
Its hardy vitality enables it to
adapt to any environment. Its
pincers will never release prey.

342.name: crawdaunt
342.description:
CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent
nature that compels it to challenge
other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in
ponds inhabited by this POKéMON,
making them desolate places.

343.name: baltoy
343.description:
BALTOY moves while spinning around on
its one foot. Primitive wall paintings
depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient
ruins.

344.name: claydol
344.description:
CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made
by primitive humans and brought to life
by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while
levitating.

345.name: lileep
345.description:
LILEEP became extinct approximately
a hundred million years ago.
This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches
approaching prey using tentacles 
shaped like flower petals.

346.name: cradily
346.description:
CRADILY roams around the ocean floor
in search of food. This POKéMON freely
extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight
tentacles.

347.name: anorith
347.description:
ANORITH was regenerated from a
prehistoric fossil. This primitive
POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its
two large claws.

348.name: armaldo
348.description:
ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks
bounce off. This POKéMON’s two
enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to
punch right through a steel slab.

349.name: feebas
349.description:
FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and
tattered from the start of its life.
Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored.
It is capable of living in both the sea
and in rivers.

350.name: milotic
350.description:
Its lovely scales are described as
rainbow colored. They change color
depending on the viewing angle.

351.name: castform
351.description:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.

352.name: kecleon
352.description:
It changes body color to blend in with
its surroundings. It also changes color if
it is happy or sad.

353.name: shuppet
353.description:
SHUPPET is attracted by feelings
of jealousy and vindictiveness.
If someone develops strong feelings of vengeance, this POKéMON will appear
in a swarm and line up beneath the eaves
of that person’s home.

354.name: banette
354.description:
BANETTE generates energy for laying
strong curses by sticking pins into its
own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful
plush doll that was thrown away.

355.name: duskull
355.description:
DUSKULL can pass through any wall no
matter how thick it may be.
Once this POKéMON chooses a target, it will doggedly pursue the intended
victim until the break of dawn.

356.name: dusclops
356.description:
DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow -
there is nothing at all inside.
It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything
into its body, but nothing will ever come
back out.

357.name: tropius
357.description:
The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s
neck are very popular with children.
This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for
fruit resulted in its own outgrowth
of fruit.

358.name: chimecho
358.description:
CHIMECHO makes its cries echo
inside its hollow body. When this
POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have
the power to knock foes flying.

359.name: absol
359.description:
Every time ABSOL appears before people,
it is followed by a disaster such as an
earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the
disaster POKéMON.

360.name: wynaut
360.description:
WYNAUT can always be seen with a big,
happy smile on its face. Look at its tail
to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be
slapping the ground with its tail.

361.name: snorunt
361.description:
SNORUNT live in regions with heavy
snowfall. In seasons without snow, such
as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among
stalactites and stalagmites deep in
caverns.

362.name: glalie
362.description:
GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it
hardens with an armor of ice.
This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any
shape it desires.

363.name: spheal
363.description:
SPHEAL is much faster rolling than 
walking to get around. When groups of
this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this,
their mealtimes are noisy.

364.name: sealeo
364.description:
SEALEO has the habit of always juggling
on the tip of its nose anything it sees
for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains
itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL
on its nose.

365.name: walrein
365.description:
It swims through icy seas while shattering
ice floes with its large tusks. It is
protected by its thick blubber.

366.name: clamperl
366.description:
CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good
for protection - it is also used for
clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be
scored with nicks and scratches all
over.

367.name: huntail
367.description:
HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by
people for a long time because it lives
at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly
even in the murky dark depths of the
ocean.

368.name: gorebyss
368.description:
GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas
at extreme depths. Its body is built to
withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of
this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed
by ordinary attacks.

369.name: relicanth
369.description:
RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that
existed for a hundred million years
without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on
microscopic organisms with its
toothless mouth.

370.name: luvdisc
370.description:
LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the
tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON
earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the
ocean’s waves.

371.name: bagon
371.description:
Dreaming of one day flying, it practices by leaping
off cliffs every day.

372.name: shelgon
372.description:
Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells
are in the midst of transformation
to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy,
making its movements sluggish.

373.name: salamence
373.description:
SALAMENCE came about as a result of a
strong, long-held dream of growing
wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in
this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to
sprout its magnificent wings.

374.name: beldum
374.description:
Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic
force courses throughout BELDUM’s
body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of
magnetism.

375.name: metang
375.description:
When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG
is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are
joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically,
this POKéMON generates strong
psychokinetic power.

376.name: metagross
376.description:
METAGROSS has four brains in total.
Combined, the four brains can breeze
through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer.
This POKéMON can float in the air by
tucking in its four legs.

377.name: regirock
377.description:
Its entire body is made of rock.
If any part chips off in battle, it
attaches rocks to repair itself.

378.name: regice
378.description:
REGICE’s body was made during an ice
age. The deep-frozen body can’t be
melted, even by fire. This POKéMON controls frigid air of
minus 328 degrees F.

379.name: registeel
379.description:
REGISTEEL has a body that is harder
than any kind of metal.
Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON
eats.

380.name: latias
380.description:
LATIAS is highly sensitive to the
emotions of people. If it senses any
hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries
shrilly to intimidate the foe.

381.name: latios
381.description:
LATIOS has the ability to make its foe
see an image of what it has seen or
imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and
understands human speech.

382.name: kyogre
382.description:
KYOGRE has the power to create massive
rain clouds that cover the entire sky
and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were
suffering from droughts.

383.name: groudon
383.description:
GROUDON has long been described in 
mythology as the POKéMON that raised
lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a
cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

384.name: rayquaza
384.description:
RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions
of years in the earth’s ozone layer, 
never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water
and particles in the atmosphere.

385.name: jirachi
385.description:
A legend states that JIRACHI will make
true any wish that is written on notes
attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will
fight without awakening.

386.name: deoxys
386.description:
The DNA of a space virus underwent a
sudden mutation upon exposure to a
laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s
chest appears to be its brain.

387.name: turtwig
387.description:
Made from soil, the shell on its
back hardens when it drinks water.
It lives along lakes.

388.name: grotle
388.description:
It knows where pure water wells
up. It carries fellow Pokémon there
on its back.

389.name: torterra
389.description:
Small Pokémon occasionally gather
on its unmoving back to begin
building their nests.

390.name: chimchar
390.description:
It agilely scales sheer cliffs to
live atop craggy mountains. Its
fire is put out when it sleeps.

391.name: monferno
391.description:
To intimidate attackers, it
stretches the fire on its tail
to make itself appear bigger.

392.name: infernape
392.description:
It uses a special kind of martial
arts involving all its limbs.
Its fire never goes out.

393.name: piplup
393.description:
Because it is very proud, it hates
accepting food from people. Its
thick down guards it from cold.

394.name: prinplup
394.description:
It lives alone, away from others.
Apparently, every one of them
believes it is the most important.

395.name: empoleon
395.description:
The three horns that extend from
its beak attest to its power. The
leader has the biggest horns.

396.name: starly
396.description:
They flock in great numbers.
Though small, they flap their
wings with great power.

397.name: staravia
397.description:
It flies around forests and fields
in search of bug Pokémon.
It stays within a huge flock.

398.name: staraptor
398.description:
It has a savage nature. It will
courageously challenge foes that
are much larger.

399.name: bidoof
399.description:
With nerves of steel, nothing can
perturb it. It is more agile and
active than it appears.

400.name: bibarel
400.description:
It makes its nest by damming
streams with bark and mud. It is
known as an industrious worker.

401.name: kricketot
401.description:
It shakes its head back to front,
causing its antennae to hit each
other and sound like a xylophone.

402.name: kricketune
402.description:
It crosses its knifelike arms in
front of its chest when it cries.
It can compose melodies ad lib.

403.name: shinx
403.description:
All of its fur dazzles if danger is
sensed. It flees while the foe is
momentarily blinded.

404.name: luxio
404.description:
Its claws loose electricity with
enough amperage to cause fainting.
They live in small groups.

405.name: luxray
405.description:
It has eyes that can see through
anything. It spots and captures
prey hiding behind objects.

406.name: budew
406.description:
Over the winter, it closes its bud
and endures the cold. In spring,
the bud opens and releases pollen.

407.name: roserade
407.description:
It attracts prey with a sweet
aroma, then downs it with
thorny whips hidden in its arms.

408.name: cranidos
408.description:
It lived in jungles around 100
million years ago. Its skull is as
hard as iron.

409.name: rampardos
409.description:
Its powerful head butt has enough
power to shatter even the most
durable things upon impact.

410.name: shieldon
410.description:
A Pokémon that lived in jungles
around 100 million years ago. Its
facial hide is extremely hard.

411.name: bastiodon
411.description:
Any frontal attack is repulsed.
It is a docile Pokémon that
feeds on grass and berries.

412.name: burmy
412.description:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry
winds, it covers itself with a cloak
made of twigs and leaves.

413.name: wormadam
413.description:
When BURMY evolved, its cloak
became a part of this Pokémon’s
body. The cloak is never shed.

414.name: mothim
414.description:
It loves the honey of flowers
and steals honey collected by
COMBEE.

415.name: combee
415.description:
A Pokémon formed by three others.
It busily carries sweet floral
honey to VESPIQUEN.

416.name: vespiquen
416.description:
Its abdomen is a honeycomb for
grubs. It raises its grubs on
honey collected by COMBEE.

417.name: pachirisu
417.description:
It makes fur balls that crackle
with static electricity. It stores
them with berries in tree holes.

418.name: buizel
418.description:
It has a flotation sac that is
like an inflatable collar. It floats
on water with its head out.

419.name: floatzel
419.description:
It floats using its well-developed
flotation sac. It assists in the
rescues of drowning people.

420.name: cherubi
420.description:
The small ball holds the nutrients
needed for evolution. Apparently,
it is very sweet and tasty.

421.name: cherrim
421.description:
It blooms during times of strong
sunlight. It tries to make up for
everything it endured as a bud.

422.name: shellos
422.description:
Its colors and shapes differ from
region to region. In the Sinnoh
region, two types are confirmed.

423.name: gastrodon
423.description:
It has a pliable body without any
bones. If any part of its body is
torn off, it grows right back.

424.name: ambipom
424.description:
To eat, it deftly shucks nuts
with its two tails. It rarely uses
its arms now.

425.name: drifloon
425.description:
A Pokémon formed by the spirits
of people and Pokémon. It loves
damp, humid seasons.

426.name: drifblim
426.description:
At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

427.name: buneary
427.description:
It slams foes by sharply uncoiling
its rolled ears. It stings enough
to make a grown-up cry in pain.

428.name: lopunny
428.description:
An extremely cautious Pokémon.
It cloaks its body with its fluffy
ear fur when it senses danger.

429.name: mismagius
429.description:
Its cries sound like incantations.
Those hearing it are tormented
by headaches and hallucinations.

430.name: honchkrow
430.description:
Becoming active at night, it is
known to swarm with numerous
MURKROW in tow.

431.name: glameow
431.description:
It claws if displeased and purrs
when affectionate. Its fickleness
is very popular among some.

432.name: purugly
432.description:
It is a brazen brute that barges
its way into another Pokémon’s
nest and claims it as its own.

433.name: chingling
433.description:
It emits cries by agitating an orb
at the back of its throat.
It moves with flouncing hops.

434.name: stunky
434.description:
It protects itself by spraying a
noxious fluid from its rear. The
stench lingers for 24 hours.

435.name: skuntank
435.description:
It sprays a vile-smelling fluid
from the tip of its tail to attack.
Its range is over 160 feet.

436.name: bronzor
436.description:
Implements shaped like it were
discovered in ancient tombs. It is
unknown if they are related.

437.name: bronzong
437.description:
One caused a news sensation when
it was dug up at a construction
site after a 2,000-year sleep.

438.name: bonsly
438.description:
It looks as if it is always crying.
It is actually adjusting its body’s
fluid levels by eliminating excess.

439.name: mime-jr
439.description:
It habitually mimics foes. Once
mimicked, the foe cannot take its
eyes off this Pokémon.

440.name: happiny
440.description:
It loves round white things.
It carries an egg-shaped rock in
imitation of CHANSEY.

441.name: chatot
441.description:
It can learn and speak human
words. If they gather, they all
learn the same saying.

442.name: spiritomb
442.description:
A Pokémon that was formed by 108
spirits. It is bound to a fissure
in an odd keystone.

443.name: gible
443.description:
It nests in small, horizontal holes
in cave walls. It pounces to catch
prey that stray too close.

444.name: gabite
444.description:
There is a long-held belief that
medicine made from its scales will
heal even incurable illnesses.

445.name: garchomp
445.description:
When it folds up its body and
extends its wings, it looks like a
jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

446.name: munchlax
446.description:
It wolfs down its weight in food
once a day, swallowing food whole
with almost no chewing.

447.name: riolu
447.description:
The aura that emanates from its
body intensifies to alert others
if it is afraid or sad.

448.name: lucario
448.description:
It has the ability to sense the
auras of all things.
It understands human speech.

449.name: hippopotas
449.description:
It lives in arid places. Instead
of perspiration, it expels grainy
sand from its body.

450.name: hippowdon
450.description:
It blasts internally stored sand
from ports on its body to create
a towering twister for attack.

451.name: skorupi
451.description:
It grips prey with its tail claws
and injects poison. It tenaciously
hangs on until the poison takes.

452.name: drapion
452.description:
It has the power in its clawed
arms to make scrap of a car. The
tips of its claws release poison.

453.name: croagunk
453.description:
Its cheeks hold poison sacs.
It tries to catch foes off guard
to jab them with toxic fingers.

454.name: toxicroak
454.description:
Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin
so vile that even a scratch could
prove fatal.

455.name: carnivine
455.description:
It attracts prey with its sweet-
smelling saliva, then chomps down.
It takes a whole day to eat prey.

456.name: finneon
456.description:
After long exposure to sunlight,
the patterns on its tail fins shine
vividly when darkness arrives.

457.name: lumineon
457.description:
It lives on the deep-sea floor.
It attracts prey by flashing the
patterns on its four tail fins.

458.name: mantyke
458.description:
A friendly Pokémon that captures
the subtle flows of seawater using
its two antennae.

459.name: snover
459.description:
It lives on snowy mountains.
Having had little contact with
humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

460.name: abomasnow
460.description:
It whips up blizzards in mountains
that are always buried in snow.
It is the abominable snowman.

461.name: weavile
461.description:
They live in cold regions, forming
groups of four or five that hunt
prey with impressive coordination.

462.name: magnezone
462.description:
It evolved from exposure to a
special magnetic field.
Three units generate magnetism.

463.name: lickilicky
463.description:
It wraps things with its extensible
tongue. Getting too close to it
will leave you soaked with drool.

464.name: rhyperior
464.description:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

465.name: tangrowth
465.description:
It ensnares prey by extending
arms made of vines. Losing arms to
predators does not trouble it.

466.name: electivire
466.description:
As its electric charge amplifies,
blue sparks begin to crackle between
its horns.

467.name: magmortar
467.description:
It blasts fireballs of over 3,600
degrees F from the ends of its
arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

468.name: togekiss
468.description:
It will never appear where there
is strife. Its sightings have
become rare recently.

469.name: yanmega
469.description:
By churning its wings, it creates
shock waves that inflict critical
internal injuries to foes.

470.name: leafeon
470.description:
Just like a plant, it uses
photosynthesis. As a result, it is
always enveloped in clear air.

471.name: glaceon
471.description:
As a protective technique, it can
completely freeze its fur to make
its hairs stand like needles.

472.name: gliscor
472.description:
It observes prey while hanging
inverted from branches. When the
chance presents itself, it swoops!

473.name: mamoswine
473.description:
Its impressive tusks are made of
ice. The population thinned when it
turned warm after the ice age.

474.name: porygon-z
474.description:
Additional software was installed
to make it a better Pokémon.
It began acting oddly, however.

475.name: gallade
475.description:
A master of courtesy and
swordsmanship, it fights using
extending swords on its elbows.

476.name: probopass
476.description:
It freely controls three small
units called Mini-Noses using
magnetic force.

477.name: dusknoir
477.description:
The antenna on its head captures
radio waves from the world of spirits
that command it to take people there.

478.name: froslass
478.description:
It freezes foes with an icy breath
nearly -60 degrees F. What seems
to be its body is actually hollow.

479.name: rotom
479.description:
Its body is composed of plasma. It
is known to infiltrate electronic
devices and wreak havoc.

480.name: uxie
480.description:
Known as “The Being of Knowledge.”
It is said that it can wipe out the
memory of those who see its eyes.

481.name: mesprit
481.description:
Known as “The Being of Emotion.”
It taught humans the nobility of
sorrow, pain, and joy.

482.name: azelf
482.description:
Known as “The Being of Willpower.”
It sleeps at the bottom of a lake
to keep the world in balance.

483.name: dialga
483.description:
It has the power to control time.
It appears in Sinnoh-region myths
as an ancient deity.

484.name: palkia
484.description:
It has the ability to distort
space. It is described as a deity
in Sinnoh-region mythology.

485.name: heatran
485.description:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It
digs in with its cross-shaped feet
to crawl on ceilings and walls.

486.name: regigigas
486.description:
There is an enduring legend that
states this Pokémon towed
continents with ropes.

487.name: giratina
487.description:
A Pokémon that is said to live in a
world on the reverse side of ours.
It appears in an ancient cemetery.

488.name: cresselia
488.description:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

489.name: phione
489.description:
It drifts in warm seas. It always returns to where it
was born, no matter how far it may have drifted.

490.name: manaphy
490.description:
Born on a cold seafloor, it
will swim great distances to
return to its birthplace.

491.name: darkrai
491.description:
It can lull people to sleep and
make them dream. It is active
during nights of the new moon.

492.name: shaymin
492.description:
It lives in flower patches and
avoids detection by curling up
to look like a flowering plant.

493.name: arceus
493.description:
It is described in mythology as
the Pokémon that shaped the
universe with its 1,000 arms.

494.name: victini
494.description:
This Pokémon brings victory. It is said
that Trainers with Victini always win,
regardless of the type of encounter.

495.name: snivy
495.description:
It is very intelligent and calm.
Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes
its movements swifter.

496.name: servine
496.description:
It moves along the ground as if sliding.
Its swift movements befuddle its foes,
and it then attacks with a vine whip.

497.name: serperior
497.description:
It can stop its opponents’
movements with just a glare. It takes
in solar energy and boosts it internally.

498.name: tepig
498.description:
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks
while shooting fireballs from its nose.
It roasts berries before it eats them.

499.name: pignite
499.description:
When its internal fire flares up, its
movements grow sharper and faster.
When in trouble, it emits smoke.

500.name: emboar
500.description:
It can throw a fire punch by setting its
fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares
deeply about its friends.

501.name: oshawott
501.description:
It fights using the scalchop on its
stomach. In response to an attack,
it retaliates immediately by slashing.

502.name: dewott
502.description:
Strict training is how it learns its
flowing double-scalchop technique.

503.name: samurott
503.description:
One swing of the sword incorporated in
its armor can fell an opponent. A simple
glare from one of them quiets everybody.

504.name: patrat
504.description:
Using food stored in cheek pouches,
they can keep watch for days. They use
their tails to communicate with others.

505.name: watchog
505.description:
When they see an enemy, their tails
stand high, and they spit the seeds of
berries stored in their cheek pouches.

506.name: lillipup
506.description:
It faces strong opponents with great
courage. But, when at a disadvantage in
a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.

507.name: herdier
507.description:
It has black, cape-like fur that is
very hard and decreases the amount
of damage it receives.

508.name: stoutland
508.description:
It rescues people stranded by
blizzards in the mountains. Its
shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

509.name: purrloin
509.description:
They steal from people for fun, but their
victims can’t help but forgive them.
Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

510.name: liepard
510.description:
These Pokémon vanish and appear
unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn
to their beautiful form and fur.

511.name: pansage
511.description:
This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest.
Eating a leaf from its head whisks
weariness away as if by magic.

512.name: simisage
512.description:
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its
barbed tail around wildly. The leaf
growing on its head is very bitter.

513.name: pansear
513.description:
When it is angered, the temperature
of its head tuft reaches 600° F.
It uses its tuft to roast berries.

514.name: simisear
514.description:
It loves sweets because they become
energy for the fire burning inside
its body.

515.name: panpour
515.description:
The water stored inside the tuft on
its head is full of nutrients. Plants
that receive its water grow large.

516.name: simipour
516.description:
The tuft on its head holds water. When
the level runs low, it replenishes the
tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.

517.name: munna
517.description:
Munna always float in the air. People
whose dreams are eaten by them
forget what the dreams had been about.

518.name: musharna
518.description:
The mist emanating from their foreheads
is packed with the dreams of people
and Pokémon.

519.name: pidove
519.description:
Each follows its Trainer’s orders as
best it can, but they sometimes fail to
understand complicated commands.

520.name: tranquill
